title: Peter Andre's 60 Minute Makeover
overview: In every show, Pete pulls together a top team of tradespeople plus an army of helpers to deliver the surprise of a lifetime to people who truly deserve something amazing to happen in their lives.So, he's taking neglected homes all over the country and transforming them in just one day! But Pete not only has to crack the whip over his decorators and their deputies, he also has four of Britain's starriest designers to contend with. The no-nonsense Linda Barker; the luxury-loving John Amabile; the impulsive Anna Ryder Richardson and the trend-setting young gun Ben Hillman. Nobody said it was going to be easy...
